Package View

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    DisplayGame
    This class 'DisplayGame', display the stage of the game
    DisplayGameOver
    This class display 'Game Over' scene after player has lost the game it allows player to restart the game it displays player's score
    DisplayWin
    This class create a Stage, will be displayed if player wins the game Allows player to return to menu scene Display score and leaderboard
    HelpDisplay
    This class display Stage of 'How to Play' of the game
    MenuDisplay
    This class display menu stage Allow change stage to DisplayGame() Allow change stage to HelpDisplay() Allow exit application
